original_text: And they will greet you and give you two loaves of bread, which you shall accept from their hand.
korean_text: 그들이 네게 문안하고 떡 두 덩이를 주겠고 너는 그의 손에서 받으리라

sentences.original_text: and give you two loaves of bread
sentences.korean_translation: 너에게 빵 두 덩어리를 줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: which you shall accept from their hand
